page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: TRANSPORT. A 1079 (Roman Road) This is a trunk road and very important to the area. Many people commute to and from work, preferring to live in this quiet part of Yorkshire within easy reach of York 12 miles distant. There are regular Cattle Markets at York & Beverley so much of the movement on the road is animal transportation. Access to some of the farm fields is also from this road which means delays for road users caused by the movement of combines and tractors. There are Race Courses at both York & Beverley and many Agricultural Shows in the area so one sees many horse-boxes on the road. Hull is the other link on this road consequently there is much movement of container lorries and loads for export Visitors from Europe use this route from Hull to York.
